nodes.text: Aldar Beedo's Podracer was a Podracer owned by the Glymphid pilot Aldar Beedo. It featured a teardrop shaped cockpit and two Manta RamAir MARK IV Flat-Twin Turbojets.

The Glymphid hitman Beedo piloted his Podracer during the Boonta Eve Classic won by Anakin Skywalker. Beedo was at the first starting line as the Boonta Eve Classic began, though he fell back in the early portion of the race. Beedo eventually finished third.
During production of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, Aldar Beedo's podracer was known simply as "Podracer A".
